summary: Encapsulates the data and operations required to assemble an iMODFLOW model, enabling addition of model components, definition of temporal discretization, validation of configuration, and generation of the necessary project and run files for execution with iMOD5.
business_intent: Offer a streamlined, highâ€‘level interface for constructing, checking, and exporting iMODFLOW model inputs, simplifying the workflow of groundwater model preparation and simulation execution.
